languages.text: "Это иррационально, Леди Теодора". {n}Голос мужчины, облаченного в причудливое одеяние, звенит от напряжения. Его лицо, половина которого скрыта синт-кожей, искажено в гримасе недовольства и недоверия.{/n} "Ассимиляция в торговую структуру — политическое и экономическое самоубийство, буквально роспись в ереси!"

traits.locale_text: "Это иррационально, Леди Теодора". {n}Голос мужчины, облаченного в причудливое одеяние, звенит от напряжения. Его лицо, половина которого скрыта синт-кожей, искажено в гримасе недовольства и недоверия.{/n} "Ассимиляция в торговую струкутуру — политическое и экономическое самоубийство, буквально роспись в ереси!"

languages.text: "That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"
languages.original_text: "Это иррационально, Леди Теодора". {n}Голос мужчины, облаченного в причудливое одеяние, звенит от напряжения. Его лицо, половина которого скрыта синт-кожей, искажено в гримасе недовольства и недоверия.{/n} "Ассимиляция в торговую структуру — политическое и экономическое самоубийство, буквально роспись в ереси!"

traits.locale_text: "That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora." {n}The man dressed in peculiar garb speaks with intensity. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economical suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

"That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora." {n}The man dressed in peculiar garb speaks with intensity. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economical suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

"That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

"That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

"That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

languages.text: “这完全不合常理，西奥多拉夫人。”{n}一个穿着古怪服装的男人开了口，发出了绷紧的声音。他半张覆着合成皮肤的脸扭在一起，露出了不满与难以置信的表情。{/n}“贸易结构的同化，无异于在政治与经济方面自毁长城。这等同于承认异端做法！”
languages.original_text: "That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: “这完全不合常理，西奥多拉夫人。”{n}一个穿着古怪服装的男人开了口，发出了绷紧的声音。他半张覆着合成皮肤的脸扭在一起，露出了不满与难以置信的表情。{/n}“贸易结构的同化，无异于在政治与经济方面自毁长城。这等同于承认异端做法！”

languages.text: «Esto es completamente irracional, lady Theodora». {n}El hombre que pronuncia estas palabras con voz tensa está ataviado de forma peculiar. Su cara, medio cubierta por piel sintética, es una mueca de desagrado e incredulidad.{/n} «Su asimilación en la estructura comercial sería un suicidio económico y político. ¡Prácticamente constituiría una admisión de herejía!».
languages.original_text: "That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: «Esto es completamente irracional, lady Theodora». {n}El hombre que pronuncia estas palabras con voz tensa está ataviado de forma peculiar. Su cara, medio cubierta por piel sintética, es una mueca de desagrado e incredulidad.{/n} «Su asimilación en la estructura comercial sería un suicidio económico y político. ¡Prácticamente constituiría una admisión de herejía!».

languages.text: 「それは単に非論理的ですよ、シオドーラ様」{n}奇妙な服装をした男は緊張で強張った声で言った。顔の半分は合成皮膚で覆われており、不快感と疑惑に満ちた表情で顔をゆがめている。{/n}「貿易構造への同化は政治的、経済的自殺行為であり、事実上異端を認めることになってしまいます！」
languages.original_text: "That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: 「それは単に非論理的ですよ、レディ・テオドラ」{n}奇妙な服装をした男は緊張で強張った声で言った。顔の半分は合成皮膚で覆われており、不快感と信じられないという表情で顔をゆがめている。{/n}「貿易構造への同化は政治的、経済的自殺行為であり、事実上異端を認めることになる！」
「それは単に非論理的ですよ、シオドーラ様」{n}奇妙な服装をした男は緊張で強張った声で言った。顔の半分は合成皮膚で覆われており、不快感と疑惑に満ちた表情で顔をゆがめている。{/n}「貿易構造への同化は政治的、経済的自殺行為であり、事実上異端を認めることになってしまいます！」

languages.text: « C'est tout bonnement irrationnel, dame Théodora, » {n}dit l'homme étrangement vêtu, la voix crispée. Son visage, dont une bonne moitié est couverte de peau synthétique, se tord dans une grimace de mécontentement et d'incrédulité.{/n} « Une intégration dans le système commercial serait un suicide politique et économique, à la limite de l'hérésie ! »
languages.original_text: "That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est tout bonnement irrationnel, dame Théodora, » {n}dit l'homme étrangement vêtu, la voix crispée. Son visage, dont une bonne moitié est couverte de peau synthétique, se tord dans une grimace de mécontentement et d'incrédulité.{/n} « Une intégration dans le système commercial serait un suicide politique et économique, à la limite de l'hérésie ! »

languages.text: "Das ist schlichtweg irrational, Lady Theodora", {n}sagt der Mann in merkwürdiger Kleidung mit angespannter Stimme. Sein zur Hälfte mit Synthhaut bedecktes Gesicht ist zu einer Grimasse aus Missbilligung und Ungläubigkeit verzerrt.{/n} "Die Assimilation in die Handelsstruktur wäre politischer und ökonomischer Selbstmord, praktisch eine Aufforderung zur Ketzerei!"
languages.original_text: "That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist schlichtweg irrational, Lady Theodora", {n}sagt der Mann in merkwürdiger Kleidung mit angespannter Stimme. Sein zur Hälfte mit Synthhaut bedecktes Gesicht ist zu einer Grimasse aus Missbilligung und Ungläubigkeit verzerrt.{/n} "Die Assimilation in die Handelsstruktur wäre politischer und ökonomischer Selbstmord, praktisch eine Aufforderung zur Ketzerei!"

languages.text: "Bu düpedüz mantık dışı Leydi Theodora." {n}Özgün kıyafetler kuşanmış adam, gerginliğini sesine yansıtarak konuşuyor. Yarısı sentetenle kaplı yüzü, hoşnutsuzluk ve hayretle asık.{/n} "Ticari yapıyı benimsemek hem ekonomik hem de politik intihar demek! Kâfirliği kabul etmekle eş değer!"
languages.original_text: "That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu düpedüz mantık dışı Leydi Theodora," {n}diyor gerginliği sesine yansımış, özgün bir kıyafet kuşanmış adam. Yarısı sentetenle kaplı yüzü hoşnutsuzluk ve hayretle asılmış.{/n} "Ticari yapıyı benimsemek hem ekonomik hem de politik intihar demek! Kâfirliği kabul etmekle eş değer!"

languages.original_text: "That is simply irrational, Lady Theodora," {n}says the man dressed in peculiar garb, his voice tight with tension. His face, half of which is covered by synskin, is twisted in a grimace of displeasure and disbelief.{/n} "Assimilation into the trade structure would be political and economic suicide, practically an admission of heresy!"
